title: Executive Order 1092-Assistant Attorney General for Interior Department Designated to Act as Interior Secretary During Absence of Secretary and First Secretary
content: In the absence of the Secretary, the First Assistant Secretary, and the Assistant Secretary of the Interior Department, the Assistant Attorney-General for the Interior Department is hereby designated as Acting Secretary.
citation: William Howard Taft, Executive Order 1092-Assistant Attorney General for Interior Department Designated to Act as Interior Secretary During Absence of Secretary and First Secretary Online by Gerhard Peters and John T. Woolley, The American Presidency Project https://www.presidency.ucsb.edu/node/364905
